Headline: Green Line Service Delayed at Harlem
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are standing at Harlem due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are standing at Harlem due to signal problems.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Update: #20 Madison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Madison/Leavitt
ShortDescription: Update: WB 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Western, Jackson, Damen, and Madison due to, police activity near Madison/Leavitt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Western, Jackson, Damen, and Madison due to, police activity near Madison/Leavitt.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
